divs: sighting detailsme and 3 friends where driving on a highway in northern oklahoma. we saw lights and thought it was a low flying airplane and then the craft appeared to the left side of the highway. the craft was moving nw at a slow speed, it had very bright lights shinning from the bottom of the craft, lighting the ground, it followed the river channel for about 3\4 of a mile and landed. we where very surprised, we stopped the car and got out to have a better look but the craft had gone behind a hill and landed but we could still see the lights. could not get anyone to go to the landing sight with me. me and the other guy went to the local police station but they just laughed at us and told us to go home. this is the second sighting i had. i was driving home from work at about 2.00am in the fall of 1973. i saw a bright light off to the right of the road in the woods. it was a peach-pink color and a block of light (not a beam) i stopped the van and looked into the woods thinking it was coon hunters. i set there for a few minutes and then i could see a figure going away from me. the figure had bright red uniform and knee high blue boots (ha ha) but true. the figure was gray in color but average size man. he turned and looked at me, had a high brow ridge, strong jaw, flattend nose and small mouth. he went in a eastery direction and the block of light went with him. he was less than 50 feet from me when i first saw him. i have more details but need to tell it to a person. a few month later my wife was watching johnny carson and there was a man on the show that had sketches of the same figure i had described to her. this is something i know was real and have lived with for many years. i have one more sighting but will not go into it now....seeing object in the sky..seen by me and my wife. sincerely larry d. pierce
Summary: driving down highway...at night...4 persons in car
